name: cbvalv1
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ cbval with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . See ~ cbvalvw for a version with two disjoint variable conditions, requiring fewer axioms, and ~ cbvalv for another variant. (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)
